message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $100. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $120. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $100 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $85. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $92.50. This would still give you a good deal considering the value of the product to you. Let's work this out!
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $92.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $90.  Let's try to make this work.
